mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_dlvr (order_id, delivery_id, seller_nm, type_nm, delivery_nm, delivery_price, price, status_cd, ship_cd) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{deliveryId}, #{sellerNm}, #{typeNm}, #{deliveryNm}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{price}, #{statusCd}, #{shipCd})
